Title: Relates to discrimination in the use of employment tests and selection procedures
Summary: Relates to discrimination in the use of employment tests and selection procedures; provides that employers that utilize a test or other selection procedure for purposes of hiring or promotion shall select and administer the test or other selection procedure to ensure that it does not have the effect of discrimination because of an individual's race, ethnic group, or sex.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to discrimination in the use of employment tests and selection procedures
